Text: If you download do everyone a favor and please seed for awhile

Quality is quite poor, alot of macroblocking in the videos with high motion scenes. Should have individually encoded each video and reduced the bitrate on the audio, 320Kbps audio is overkill. The version of Xvid used for encoding is outdated. Very disappointing considering the file size.

I wish I had more positive comments but I don't, try again do better.
